Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules

Class BRules

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules.Rules<BState,​BRules>
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.rules.BRules
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicableBRules, ApplicableRules<BState,​BRules>, ExpandableBRules, ExpandableRules<BState,​BRules>, RulesConvertible<BState,​BRules>
public class BRules
extends Rules<BState,​BRules>
implements ApplicableBRules, ExpandableBRules
Brief Build Rules are Rules dedicated entirely to the Build GameOperation
See Also:
Build
